comment: We all go through different seasons in our lives , sometimes you feel like you are a miracle and sometimes you wonder why you exist . It does not matter what season you are in , it is time to overflow with Faith , Hope , Love and Strength .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / go-through-20
            :ARG0 (w / we
                  :mod (a / all))
            :ARG1 (s / season
                  :ARG1-of (d / differ-02)
                  :part-of (l / life
                        :poss w)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / miracle
                        :domain y)
                  :time (s2 / sometimes))
            :op2 (w2 / wonder-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                              :ARG1 (e / exist-01
                                    :ARG1 y)))
                  :time (s3 / sometimes)))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (m3 / matter-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (s4 / season
                        :domain (y2 / you)))
            :op2 (t2 / time

                              :op2 (h / hopeful-03)
                              :op3 (l2 / love-01)
                              :op4 (s5 / strong-02))))))

comment: It s my birthday and I get to share with the world one of the greatest gift , my poetry album ( audio ) titled OVERFLOW The album is available on different streaming platforms . You can listen to it on my YouTube Channel and SoundCloud ( Nancy Lazaro ) <URL>
